ar-d_atk/def_1.name: AR-D Atk/Def 1
ar-d_atk/def_1.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_atk/def_2.name: AR-D Atk/Def 2
ar-d_atk/def_2.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_atk/def_3.name: AR-D Atk/Def 3
ar-d_atk/def_3.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_atk/res_1.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_atk/res_2.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_def/res_1.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Def/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_def/res_2.name: AR-D Def/Res 2
ar-d_def/res_2.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Def/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_def/res_3.name: AR-D Def/Res 3
ar-d_def/res_3.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Def/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_spd/def_1.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_spd/def_2.name: AR-D Spd/Def 2
ar-d_spd/def_2.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_spd/def_3.name: AR-D Spd/Def 3
ar-d_spd/def_3.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_spd/res_1.name: AR-D Spd/Res 1
ar-d_spd/res_1.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_spd/res_2.name: AR-D Spd/Res 2
ar-d_spd/res_2.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-d_spd/res_3.name: AR-D Spd/Res 3
ar-d_spd/res_3.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-o_atk/def_1.name: AR-O Atk/Def 1
ar-o_atk/def_1.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +4; 3 grants +3; 4 grants +2; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-o_atk/def_2.name: AR-O Atk/Def 2
ar-o_atk/def_2.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +7; 3 grants +5; 4 grants +3; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-o_atk/def_3.name: AR-O Atk/Def 3
ar-o_atk/def_3.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +10; 3 grants +7; 4 grants +4; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-o_atk/spd_1.name: AR-O Atk/Spd 1
ar-o_atk/spd_1.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +4; 3 grants +3; 4 grants +2; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-o_atk/spd_2.name: AR-O Atk/Spd 2
ar-o_atk/spd_2.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +7; 3 grants +5; 4 grants +3; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-o_atk/spd_3.name: AR-O Atk/Spd 3
ar-o_atk/spd_3.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +10; 3 grants +7; 4 grants +4; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-o_spd/res_1.name: AR-O Spd/Res 1
ar-o_spd/res_1.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +4; 3 grants +3; 4 grants +2; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-o_spd/res_2.name: AR-O Spd/Res 2
ar-o_spd/res_2.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +7; 3 grants +5; 4 grants +3; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

ar-o_spd/res_3.name: AR-O Spd/Res 3
ar-o_spd/res_3.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +10; 3 grants +7; 4 grants +4; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

armored_blow_1.name: Armored Blow 1
armored_blow_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+2 during combat.

armored_blow_2.name: Armored Blow 2
armored_blow_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat.

armored_blow_3.name: Armored Blow 3
armored_blow_3.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+6 during combat.

ashera's_chosen.name: Ashera's Chosen
ashera's_chosen.description: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses. If unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, grants Atk/Def+6 during combat.

atk/def_bond_1.name: Atk/Def Bond 1
atk/def_bond_1.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+3 during combat.

atk/def_bond_2.name: Atk/Def Bond 2
atk/def_bond_2.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

atk/def_bond_3.name: Atk/Def Bond 3
atk/def_bond_3.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+5 during combat.

atk/def_form_1.name: Atk/Def Form 1
atk/def_form_1.description: Grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

atk/def_form_2.name: Atk/Def Form 2
atk/def_form_2.description: Grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5.)

atk/def_form_3.name: Atk/Def Form 3
atk/def_form_3.description: Grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7.)

atk/def_push_1.name: Atk/Def Push 1
atk/def_push_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

atk/def_push_2.name: Atk/Def Push 2
atk/def_push_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

atk/def_push_3.name: Atk/Def Push 3
atk/def_push_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

atk/def_push_4.name: Atk/Def Push 4
atk/def_push_4.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Def+7, but if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit after combat.

atk/def_solo_1.name: Atk/Def Solo 1
atk/def_solo_1.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+2 during combat.

atk/def_solo_2.name: Atk/Def Solo 2
atk/def_solo_2.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

atk/def_solo_3.name: Atk/Def Solo 3
atk/def_solo_3.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+6 during combat.

atk/res_bond_1.name: Atk/Res Bond 1
atk/res_bond_1.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+3 during combat.

atk/res_bond_2.name: Atk/Res Bond 2
atk/res_bond_2.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.

atk/res_bond_3.name: Atk/Res Bond 3
atk/res_bond_3.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+5 during combat.

atk/res_bond_4.name: Atk/Res Bond 4
atk/res_bond_4.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Res during combat.

atk/res_push_1.name: Atk/Res Push 1
atk/res_push_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

atk/res_push_2.name: Atk/Res Push 2
atk/res_push_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

atk/res_push_3.name: Atk/Res Push 3
atk/res_push_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

atk/res_push_4.name: Atk/Res Push 4
atk/res_push_4.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Res+7, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

atk/res_solo_1.name: Atk/Res Solo 1
atk/res_solo_1.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+2 during combat.

atk/res_solo_2.name: Atk/Res Solo 2
atk/res_solo_2.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.

atk/res_solo_3.name: Atk/Res Solo 3
atk/res_solo_3.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+6 during combat.

atk/res_solo_4.name: Atk/Res Solo 4
atk/res_solo_4.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+7 during combat.

atk/spd_bond_1.name: Atk/Spd Bond 1
atk/spd_bond_1.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+3 during combat.

atk/spd_bond_2.name: Atk/Spd Bond 2
atk/spd_bond_2.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

atk/spd_bond_3.name: Atk/Spd Bond 3
atk/spd_bond_3.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

atk/spd_bond_4.name: Atk/Spd Bond 4
atk/spd_bond_4.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

atk/spd_form_1.name: Atk/Spd Form 1
atk/spd_form_1.description: Grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

atk/spd_form_2.name: Atk/Spd Form 2
atk/spd_form_2.description: Grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5.)

atk/spd_form_3.name: Atk/Spd Form 3
atk/spd_form_3.description: Grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat. (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7.)

atk/spd_push_1.name: Atk/Spd Push 1
atk/spd_push_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

atk/spd_push_2.name: Atk/Spd Push 2
atk/spd_push_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

atk/spd_push_3.name: Atk/Spd Push 3
atk/spd_push_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

atk/spd_push_4.name: Atk/Spd Push 4
atk/spd_push_4.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+7, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

atk/spd_solo_1.name: Atk/Spd Solo 1
atk/spd_solo_1.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+2 during combat.

atk/spd_solo_2.name: Atk/Spd Solo 2
atk/spd_solo_2.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

atk/spd_solo_3.name: Atk/Spd Solo 3
atk/spd_solo_3.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 during combat.

atk/spd_solo_4.name: Atk/Spd Solo 4
atk/spd_solo_4.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+7 during combat.

b_duel_flying_1.name: B Duel Flying 1
b_duel_flying_1.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

b_duel_flying_2.name: B Duel Flying 2
b_duel_flying_2.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

b_duel_flying_3.name: B Duel Flying 3
b_duel_flying_3.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

b_duel_infantry_1.name: B Duel Infantry 1
b_duel_infantry_1.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

b_duel_infantry_2.name: B Duel Infantry 2
b_duel_infantry_2.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

b_duel_infantry_3.name: B Duel Infantry 3
b_duel_infantry_3.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

blade_session_1.name: Blade Session 1
blade_session_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = 1 + number of allies who have already acted (max value of 3).

blade_session_2.name: Blade Session 2
blade_session_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = 2 + number of allies who have already acted × 2 (max value of 6).

blade_session_3.name: Blade Session 3
blade_session_3.description: If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = 3 + number of allies who have already acted × 3 (max value of 9).

bonus_doubler_1.name: Bonus Doubler 1
bonus_doubler_1.description: Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = 50% of current bonus on each of unit's stats. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

bonus_doubler_2.name: Bonus Doubler 2
bonus_doubler_2.description: Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = 75% of current bonus on each of unit's stats. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

bonus_doubler_3.name: Bonus Doubler 3
bonus_doubler_3.description: Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

bracing_blow_1.name: Bracing Blow 1
bracing_blow_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

bracing_blow_2.name: Bracing Blow 2
bracing_blow_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

bracing_stance_1.name: Bracing Stance 1
bracing_stance_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

bracing_stance_2.name: Bracing Stance 2
bracing_stance_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

bracing_stance_3.name: Bracing Stance 3
bracing_stance_3.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+6 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

brazen_atk/def_1.name: Brazen Atk/Def 1
brazen_atk/def_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Def+3 during combat.

brazen_atk/def_2.name: Brazen Atk/Def 2
brazen_atk/def_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Def+5 during combat.

brazen_atk/def_3.name: Brazen Atk/Def 3
brazen_atk/def_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Def+7 during combat.

brazen_atk/res_1.name: Brazen Atk/Res 1
brazen_atk/res_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Res+3 during combat.

brazen_atk/res_2.name: Brazen Atk/Res 2
brazen_atk/res_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Res+5 during combat.

brazen_atk/res_3.name: Brazen Atk/Res 3
brazen_atk/res_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Res+7 during combat.

brazen_atk/spd_1.name: Brazen Atk/Spd 1
brazen_atk/spd_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Spd+3 during combat.

brazen_atk/spd_2.name: Brazen Atk/Spd 2
brazen_atk/spd_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

brazen_atk/spd_3.name: Brazen Atk/Spd 3
brazen_atk/spd_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Spd+7 during combat.

brazen_atk/spd_4.name: Brazen Atk/Spd 4
brazen_atk/spd_4.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk+9 and Spd+10 during combat.

brazen_def/res_1.name: Brazen Def/Res 1
brazen_def/res_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Def/Res+3 during combat.

brazen_def/res_2.name: Brazen Def/Res 2
brazen_def/res_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Def/Res+5 during combat.

brazen_def/res_3.name: Brazen Def/Res 3
brazen_def/res_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Def/Res+7 during combat.

brazen_spd/def_1.name: Brazen Spd/Def 1
brazen_spd/def_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Def+3 during combat.

brazen_spd/def_2.name: Brazen Spd/Def 2
brazen_spd/def_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Def+5 during combat.

brazen_spd/def_3.name: Brazen Spd/Def 3
brazen_spd/def_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Def+7 during combat.

brazen_spd/res_1.name: Brazen Spd/Res 1
brazen_spd/res_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Res+3 during combat.

brazen_spd/res_2.name: Brazen Spd/Res 2
brazen_spd/res_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Res+5 during combat.

brazen_spd/res_3.name: Brazen Spd/Res 3
brazen_spd/res_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Res+7 during combat.

c_duel_infantry_1.name: C Duel Infantry 1
c_duel_infantry_1.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

c_duel_infantry_2.name: C Duel Infantry 2
c_duel_infantry_2.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

c_duel_infantry_3.name: C Duel Infantry 3
c_duel_infantry_3.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

close_counter.name: Close Counter
close_counter.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

close_def_1.name: Close Def 1
close_def_1.description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

close_def_2.name: Close Def 2
close_def_2.description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

close_def_3.name: Close Def 3
close_def_3.description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

close_foil.name: Close Foil
close_foil.description: If sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit during combat and unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

darting_blow_1.name: Darting Blow 1
darting_blow_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+2 during combat.

darting_blow_2.name: Darting Blow 2
darting_blow_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.

darting_blow_3.name: Darting Blow 3
darting_blow_3.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

darting_blow_4.name: Darting Blow 4
darting_blow_4.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+9 during combat.

darting_breath.name: Darting Breath
darting_breath.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

darting_stance_1.name: Darting Stance 1
darting_stance_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+2 during combat.

darting_stance_2.name: Darting Stance 2
darting_stance_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.

darting_stance_3.name: Darting Stance 3
darting_stance_3.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

death_blow_1.name: Death Blow 1
death_blow_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+2 during combat.

death_blow_2.name: Death Blow 2
death_blow_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat.

death_blow_3.name: Death Blow 3
death_blow_3.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during combat.

death_blow_4.name: Death Blow 4
death_blow_4.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+8 during combat.

def/res_bond_1.name: Def/Res Bond 1
def/res_bond_1.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+3 during combat.

def/res_bond_2.name: Def/Res Bond 2
def/res_bond_2.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

def/res_bond_3.name: Def/Res Bond 3
def/res_bond_3.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+5 during combat.

def/res_solo_1.name: Def/Res Solo 1
def/res_solo_1.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

def/res_solo_2.name: Def/Res Solo 2
def/res_solo_2.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

def/res_solo_3.name: Def/Res Solo 3
def/res_solo_3.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

defiant_atk_1.name: Defiant Atk 1
defiant_atk_1.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Atk+3 for 1 turn.

defiant_atk_2.name: Defiant Atk 2
defiant_atk_2.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Atk+5 for 1 turn.

defiant_atk_3.name: Defiant Atk 3
defiant_atk_3.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Atk+7 for 1 turn.

defiant_def_1.name: Defiant Def 1
defiant_def_1.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+3 for 1 turn.

defiant_def_2.name: Defiant Def 2
defiant_def_2.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+5 for 1 turn.

defiant_def_3.name: Defiant Def 3
defiant_def_3.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+7 for 1 turn.

defiant_res_1.name: Defiant Res 1
defiant_res_1.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Res+3 for 1 turn.

defiant_res_2.name: Defiant Res 2
defiant_res_2.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Res+5 for 1 turn.

defiant_res_3.name: Defiant Res 3
defiant_res_3.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Res+7 for 1 turn.

defiant_spd_1.name: Defiant Spd 1
defiant_spd_1.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Spd+3 for 1 turn.

defiant_spd_2.name: Defiant Spd 2
defiant_spd_2.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Spd+5 for 1 turn.

defiant_spd_3.name: Defiant Spd 3
defiant_spd_3.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Spd+7 for 1 turn.

distant_counter.name: Distant Counter
distant_counter.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

distant_def_1.name: Distant Def 1
distant_def_1.description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

distant_def_2.name: Distant Def 2
distant_def_2.description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

distant_def_3.name: Distant Def 3
distant_def_3.description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

distant_def_4.name: Distant Def 4
distant_def_4.description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+8 and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

distant_foil.name: Distant Foil
distant_foil.description: If sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit during combat and unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

distant_ward.name: Distant Ward
distant_ward.description: If magic, staff, or dragonstone foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat and unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

dragonskin.name: Dragonskin
dragonskin.description: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses.If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

dragoon_shield.name: Dragoon Shield
dragoon_shield.description: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses. Grants Atk/Spd/Def+3.

earth_boost_1.name: Earth Boost 1
earth_boost_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+2 during combat.

earth_boost_2.name: Earth Boost 2
earth_boost_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+4 during combat.

earth_boost_3.name: Earth Boost 3
earth_boost_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+6 during combat.

fierce_breath.name: Fierce Breath
fierce_breath.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

fierce_stance_1.name: Fierce Stance 1
fierce_stance_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+2 during combat.

fierce_stance_2.name: Fierce Stance 2
fierce_stance_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat.

fierce_stance_3.name: Fierce Stance 3
fierce_stance_3.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during combat.

fire_boost_1.name: Fire Boost 1
fire_boost_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Atk+2 during combat.

fire_boost_2.name: Fire Boost 2
fire_boost_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Atk+4 during combat.

fire_boost_3.name: Fire Boost 3
fire_boost_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Atk+6 during combat.

flashing_blade_1.name: Flashing Blade 1
flashing_blade_1.description: If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+5, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack.(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

flashing_blade_2.name: Flashing Blade 2
flashing_blade_2.description: If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+3, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack.(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

flashing_blade_3.name: Flashing Blade 3
flashing_blade_3.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack.(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

flashing_blade_4.name: Flashing Blade 4
flashing_blade_4.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, grants Special cooldown charge +1 and deals +5 damage per unit's attack.(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

fury_1.name: Fury 1
fury_1.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+1. After combat, deals 2 damage to unit.

fury_2.name: Fury 2
fury_2.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. After combat, deals 4 damage to unit.

fury_3.name: Fury 3
fury_3.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat, deals 6 damage to unit.

fury_4.name: Fury 4
fury_4.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4. After combat, deals 8 damage to unit.

g_duel_flying_1.name: G Duel Flying 1
g_duel_flying_1.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

g_duel_flying_2.name: G Duel Flying 2
g_duel_flying_2.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

g_duel_flying_3.name: G Duel Flying 3
g_duel_flying_3.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

g_duel_infantry_1.name: G Duel Infantry 1
g_duel_infantry_1.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

g_duel_infantry_2.name: G Duel Infantry 2
g_duel_infantry_2.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

g_duel_infantry_3.name: G Duel Infantry 3
g_duel_infantry_3.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

heavy_blade_1.name: Heavy Blade 1
heavy_blade_1.description: If unit's Atk ≥ foe's Atk+5, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

heavy_blade_2.name: Heavy Blade 2
heavy_blade_2.description: If unit's Atk ≥ foe's Atk+3, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

heavy_blade_3.name: Heavy Blade 3
heavy_blade_3.description: If unit's Atk > foe's Atk, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

heavy_blade_4.name: Heavy Blade 4
heavy_blade_4.description: If unit's Atk > foe's Atk, grants Special cooldown charge +1 and deals +5 damage to foe per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

kestrel_stance_1.name: Kestrel Stance 1
kestrel_stance_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+2 during combat.

kestrel_stance_2.name: Kestrel Stance 2
kestrel_stance_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

kestrel_stance_3.name: Kestrel Stance 3
kestrel_stance_3.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+6 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

laws_of_sacae.name: Laws of Sacae
laws_of_sacae.description: If foe initiates combat and the number of allies within 2 spaces ≥ 2, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

mirror_impact.name: Mirror Impact
mirror_impact.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Res+10 during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

mirror_stance_1.name: Mirror Stance 1
mirror_stance_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+2 during combat.

mirror_stance_2.name: Mirror Stance 2
mirror_stance_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.

mirror_stance_3.name: Mirror Stance 3
mirror_stance_3.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+6 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

mirror_strike_1.name: Mirror Strike 1
mirror_strike_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+2 during combat.

mirror_strike_2.name: Mirror Strike 2
mirror_strike_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.

ostian_counter.name: Ostian Counter
ostian_counter.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

r_duel_flying_1.name: R Duel Flying 1
r_duel_flying_1.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

r_duel_flying_2.name: R Duel Flying 2
r_duel_flying_2.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

r_duel_flying_3.name: R Duel Flying 3
r_duel_flying_3.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

r_duel_infantry_1.name: R Duel Infantry 1
r_duel_infantry_1.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

r_duel_infantry_2.name: R Duel Infantry 2
r_duel_infantry_2.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

r_duel_infantry_3.name: R Duel Infantry 3
r_duel_infantry_3.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

scendscale.name: Scendscale
scendscale.description: Deals damage = 25% of unit's Atk, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 7 damage to unit.

shield_session_1.name: Shield Session 1
shield_session_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Def/Res during combat = 3 - number of foes who have already acted (min value of 1).

shield_session_2.name: Shield Session 2
shield_session_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Def/Res during combat = 6 - number of foes who have already acted × 2 (min value of 2).

shield_session_3.name: Shield Session 3
shield_session_3.description: If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Def/Res during combat = 9 - number of foes who have already acted × 3 (min value of 3).

sorcery_blade_1.name: Sorcery Blade 1
sorcery_blade_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and unit is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

sorcery_blade_2.name: Sorcery Blade 2
sorcery_blade_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

sorcery_blade_3.name: Sorcery Blade 3
sorcery_blade_3.description: At start of combat, if unit is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

spd/def_bond_1.name: Spd/Def Bond 1
spd/def_bond_1.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+3 during combat.

spd/def_bond_2.name: Spd/Def Bond 2
spd/def_bond_2.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat.

spd/def_bond_3.name: Spd/Def Bond 3
spd/def_bond_3.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+5 during combat.

spd/def_form_1.name: Spd/Def Form 1
spd/def_form_1.description: Grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

spd/def_form_2.name: Spd/Def Form 2
spd/def_form_2.description: Grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5.)

spd/def_form_3.name: Spd/Def Form 3
spd/def_form_3.description: Grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7.)

spd/def_solo_1.name: Spd/Def Solo 1
spd/def_solo_1.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+2 during combat.

spd/def_solo_2.name: Spd/Def Solo 2
spd/def_solo_2.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat.

spd/def_solo_3.name: Spd/Def Solo 3
spd/def_solo_3.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+6 during combat.

spd/res_bond_1.name: Spd/Res Bond 1
spd/res_bond_1.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+3 during combat.

spd/res_bond_2.name: Spd/Res Bond 2
spd/res_bond_2.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+4 during combat.

spd/res_bond_3.name: Spd/Res Bond 3
spd/res_bond_3.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+5 during combat.

spd/res_form_1.name: Spd/Res Form 1
spd/res_form_1.description: Grants Spd/Res+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

spd/res_form_2.name: Spd/Res Form 2
spd/res_form_2.description: Grants Spd/Res+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5.)

spd/res_form_3.name: Spd/Res Form 3
spd/res_form_3.description: Grants Spd/Res+X to unit during combat. (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7.)

spd/res_solo_1.name: Spd/Res Solo 1
spd/res_solo_1.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+2 during combat.

spd/res_solo_2.name: Spd/Res Solo 2
spd/res_solo_2.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+4 during combat.

spd/res_solo_3.name: Spd/Res Solo 3
spd/res_solo_3.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+6 during combat.

steady_blow_1.name: Steady Blow 1
steady_blow_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+2 during combat.

steady_blow_2.name: Steady Blow 2
steady_blow_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat.

steady_breath.name: Steady Breath
steady_breath.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

steady_posture_1.name: Steady Posture 1
steady_posture_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+2 during combat.

steady_posture_2.name: Steady Posture 2
steady_posture_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat.

steady_posture_3.name: Steady Posture 3
steady_posture_3.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+6 to unit during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

steady_stance_1.name: Steady Stance 1
steady_stance_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+2 during combat.

steady_stance_2.name: Steady Stance 2
steady_stance_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat.

steady_stance_3.name: Steady Stance 3
steady_stance_3.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+6 during combat.

steady_stance_4.name: Steady Stance 4
steady_stance_4.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+8 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

sturdy_blow_1.name: Sturdy Blow 1
sturdy_blow_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+2 during combat.

sturdy_blow_2.name: Sturdy Blow 2
sturdy_blow_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

sturdy_impact.name: Sturdy Impact
sturdy_impact.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Def+10 during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

sturdy_stance_1.name: Sturdy Stance 1
sturdy_stance_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+2 during combat.

sturdy_stance_2.name: Sturdy Stance 2
sturdy_stance_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

sturdy_stance_3.name: Sturdy Stance 3
sturdy_stance_3.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+6 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

swift_sparrow_1.name: Swift Sparrow 1
swift_sparrow_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+2 during combat.

swift_sparrow_2.name: Swift Sparrow 2
swift_sparrow_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

swift_sparrow_3.name: Swift Sparrow 3
swift_sparrow_3.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Spd+7 during combat.

swift_stance_1.name: Swift Stance 1
swift_stance_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Res+2 during combat.

swift_stance_2.name: Swift Stance 2
swift_stance_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Res+4 during combat.

swift_strike_1.name: Swift Strike 1
swift_strike_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Res+2 during combat.

swift_strike_2.name: Swift Strike 2
swift_strike_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Res+4 during combat.

triangle_adept_1.name: Triangle Adept 1
triangle_adept_1.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 10%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 10%.

triangle_adept_2.name: Triangle Adept 2
triangle_adept_2.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 15%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 15%.

triangle_adept_3.name: Triangle Adept 3
triangle_adept_3.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.

warding_blow_1.name: Warding Blow 1
warding_blow_1.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+2 during combat.

warding_blow_2.name: Warding Blow 2
warding_blow_2.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+4 during combat.

warding_blow_3.name: Warding Blow 3
warding_blow_3.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+6 during combat.

warding_breath.name: Warding Breath
warding_breath.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

warding_stance_1.name: Warding Stance 1
warding_stance_1.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+2 during combat.

warding_stance_2.name: Warding Stance 2
warding_stance_2.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+4 during combat.

warding_stance_3.name: Warding Stance 3
warding_stance_3.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+6 during combat.

warding_stance_4.name: Warding Stance 4
warding_stance_4.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+8 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

water_boost_1.name: Water Boost 1
water_boost_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Res+2 during combat.

water_boost_2.name: Water Boost 2
water_boost_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Res+4 during combat.

water_boost_3.name: Water Boost 3
water_boost_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Res+6 during combat.

wind_boost_1.name: Wind Boost 1
wind_boost_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Spd+2 during combat.

wind_boost_2.name: Wind Boost 2
wind_boost_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Spd+4 during combat.

wind_boost_3.name: Wind Boost 3
wind_boost_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Spd+6 during combat.
